body.body: The front fork installation procedure does not reflect the information displayed in the suspension specification settings.
Therefore when measuring the fork pull through, step 3 should read:
Position the forks through the lower yoke, so that the flat portion of the top cap is 28.4 mm
/- 0.5 mm from the lower edge of the upper yoke.
The torque figures and remainder of the installation procedure remain unchanged.
Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information.

Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information. For electronic service manuals, store this information in a readily accessible place and refer to it often. This information will be included in the next service manual update.

title: Front Fork Installation
